trans-unit.resname: I met Christabel on July 1st, 2019, at Murtala Mohamed international airport. Our mutual friend Angela insisted on seeing me off to the airport. We went to the airport lounge for lunch and while there I decided to make Everyone feel at ease, especially her. So I engaged her in a conversation about her field. She was very relaxed and confident while explaining her real estate business.Being a lover of real estate and a civil engineer, We bounded our discussion around it.
trans-unit.source: I met Christabel on July 1st, 2019, at Murtala Mohamed international airport. Our mutual friend Angela insisted on seeing me off to the airport. We went to the airport lounge for lunch and while there I decided to make Everyone feel at ease, especially her. So I engaged her in a conversation about her field. She was very relaxed and confident while explaining her real estate business.Being a lover of real estate and a civil engineer, We bounded our discussion around it.
trans-unit.target: J'ai rencontré Christabel le 1er juillet 2019 à l'aéroport international Murtala Mohamed. Notre amie commune Angela a insisté pour m'accompagner à l'aéroport. Nous sommes allés au salon de l'aéroport pour le déjeuner et pendant que j'étais là, j'ai décidé de mettre tout le monde à l'aise, surtout elle. Je l'ai donc engagée dans une conversation sur son domaine. Elle était très détendue et confiante tout en expliquant son entreprise immobilière. Étant un amoureux de l'immobilier et un ingénieur civil, nous avons limité notre discussion autour de cela.

trans-unit.resname: My next visit to Nigeria was on the 28th of November 2019 for business. I gave her a surprise visit to the kingdom hall of Jehovah’s witnesses. when she turned around during the song, she was so shocked to see me. she could not stand on her feet, lol. From there we discussed more business. Most of our discussion was centered around real estate for more than one year.
trans-unit.source: My next visit to Nigeria was on the 28th of November 2019 for business. I gave her a surprise visit to the kingdom hall of Jehovah’s witnesses. when she turned around during the song, she was so shocked to see me. she could not stand on her feet, lol. From there we discussed more business. Most of our discussion was centered around real estate for more than one year.
trans-unit.target: Ma prochaine visite au Nigéria a eu lieu le 28 novembre 2019 pour affaires. Je lui ai fait une visite surprise à la salle du royaume des témoins de Jéhovah. quand elle s'est retournée pendant la chanson, elle était tellement choquée de me voir. elle ne pouvait pas se tenir debout, lol. De là, nous avons discuté plus d'affaires. La majeure partie de notre discussion a été centrée sur l'immobilier pendant plus d'un an.

trans-unit.resname: But I started loving her calm attitude and kindness toward her work and general lifestyle. I ask her why a beautiful lady like her was still single. She laughed and she told me she’s still waiting for a kindhearted man.
trans-unit.source: But I started loving her calm attitude and kindness toward her work and general lifestyle. I ask her why a beautiful lady like her was still single. She laughed and she told me she’s still waiting for a kindhearted man.
trans-unit.target: Mais j'ai commencé à aimer son attitude calme et sa gentillesse envers son travail et son style de vie en général. Je lui demande pourquoi une belle dame comme elle était toujours célibataire. Elle a ri et elle m'a dit qu'elle attendait toujours un homme au bon cœur.

trans-unit.resname: I jumped on the opportunity, showing her my kind heart and as a french guy,I had to quickly mark my territory lol Since no one was doing so … hahaha. She was a bit confused, but we gradually built trust in each other.
trans-unit.source: I jumped on the opportunity, showing her my kind heart and as a french guy,I had to quickly mark my territory lol Since no one was doing so … hahaha. She was a bit confused, but we gradually built trust in each other.
trans-unit.target: J'ai sauté sur l'occasion, lui montrant mon bon cœur et en tant que français, j'ai dû rapidement marquer mon territoire lol Vu que personne ne le faisait… hahaha. Elle était un peu confuse, mais nous nous sommes progressivement fait confiance.

trans-unit.resname: I left 2 weeks after, came back Feb 2021 due to covid, our friendship became stronger and stronger, she started seeing me as her best friend, and I always look at her as my partner. We spent 2 weeks together in Feb 2021 and that was when I realized that I will love to spend the rest of my life with her.
trans-unit.source: I left 2 weeks after, came back Feb 2021 due to covid, our friendship became stronger and stronger, she started seeing me as her best friend, and I always look at her as my partner. We spent 2 weeks together in Feb 2021 and that was when I realized that I will love to spend the rest of my life with her.
trans-unit.target: Je suis parti 2 semaines après, je suis revenu en février 2021 à cause de covid, notre amitié est devenue de plus en plus forte, elle a commencé à me voir comme son meilleur ami, et je la regarde toujours comme ma partenaire. Nous avons passé 2 semaines ensemble en février 2021 et c'est à ce moment-là que j'ai réalisé que j'adorerais passer le reste de ma vie avec elle.

trans-unit.resname: It wasn’t all smooth but patience & Jah’s grace carried us through. I waited another year which means March 2022 to prove my seriousness and commitment. On the 29th of March 2022 at Radisson blu VI Lagos at 9:20 pm, I planned the proposal WITH MOM AND I SPA, Klala films and photo, Radisson blue management and here we are today. I am the happiest man on earth.
trans-unit.source: It wasn’t all smooth but patience & Jah’s grace carried us through. I waited another year which means March 2022 to prove my seriousness and commitment. On the 29th of March 2022 at Radisson blu VI Lagos at 9:20 pm, I planned the proposal WITH MOM AND I SPA, Klala films and photo, Radisson blue management and here we are today. I am the happiest man on earth.
trans-unit.target: Tout n'a pas été facile, mais la patience et la grâce de Jah nous ont permis de traverser. J'ai attendu une autre année, c'est-à-dire mars 2022, pour prouver mon sérieux et mon engagement. Le 29 mars 2022 au Radisson blu VI Lagos à 21h20, j'ai planifié la proposition AVEC MOM AND I SPA, Klala films and photo, Radisson blue management et nous voilà aujourd'hui. Je suis l'homme le plus heureux de la terre.

trans-unit.resname: Baby, I LOVE YOU AND WILL CONTINUE TO LOVE YOU
trans-unit.source: Baby, I LOVE YOU AND WILL CONTINUE TO LOVE YOU
trans-unit.target: Bébé, JE T'AIME ET CONTINUERAI À T'AIMER
de Jéhovah (arrêt de bus Lekki Lagos ELF)

trans-unit.resname:
We thank to all our value guests ( familly, friends, organization)that contributed to make alive this
wedding that will be memorable for us. Thank you once again for y'all kind gesture, prayer, advise,
encouragements and donation to make it succesful. GLORY to Jehovah GOD.
trans-unit.source:
We thank to all our value guests ( familly, friends, organization)that contributed to make alive this
wedding that will be memorable for us. Thank you once again for y'all kind gesture, prayer, advise,
encouragements and donation to make it succesful. GLORY to Jehovah GOD.
trans-unit.target:
Nous remercions tous nos précieux invités (famille, amis, organisation) qui ont contribué à faire vivre ce
mariage qui sera mémorable pour nous. Merci encore pour votre aimable geste, vos prières, vos conseils,
vos encouragements et vos dons pour en faire un succès. GLOIRE à Jéhovah DIEU.
